message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs.  I'm asking $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob, but $120 is too low for me.  This product is high-quality and worth every penny. Could you do $170?
I understand that the product is high-quality, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $170. Can you consider $145? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
